# Bundled Third-Party Library

## Vidinfra Player Library

This directory contains the bundled Vidinfra Player library.

### Library Information

- **Package Name**: `@vidinfra/player`
- **NPM Registry**: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@vidinfra/player
- **License**: MIT License
- **Version**: Latest (as of plugin packaging)

### Source Code

The unminified source code for this library is available at:

- NPM Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@vidinfra/player
- GitHub Repository: (Link to GitHub repo if available)

### Why Bundled?

This library is bundled with the plugin to:

1. Ensure compatibility with the plugin version
2. Provide offline functionality
3. Reduce external dependencies for users
4. Maintain consistent player behavior

### License Compatibility

The Vidinfra Player library is licensed under the MIT License, which is compatible with the GPL v2 or later license used by this WordPress plugin.

### Updates

This library is updated with each plugin release. To update manually:

```bash
npm install @vidinfra/player@latest
# Copy the appropriate build file to this directory
```

### Support

For issues specific to the Vidinfra Player library, please refer to:

- NPM Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@vidinfra/player
- Vidinfra Support: https://vidinfra.com/support

For issues with the WordPress plugin integration, please use the plugin's support forum.
